tasks.name: Create SessionRecord interface with sessionId, agentName, model, startedAt, completedAt, status, and exitCode fields
tasks.report: Added SessionStatus type union, SessionRecord interface, and extended Task interface with sessions array and currentSessionId fields in src/lib/types.ts. All types are exported and backwards compatible (new fields are optional).

tasks.name: Extend Task interface with sessions array and currentSessionId fields
tasks.report: Added SessionStatus type union, SessionRecord interface, and extended Task interface with sessions array and currentSessionId fields in src/lib/types.ts. All types are exported and backwards compatible (new fields are optional).

tasks.name: Add SessionStatus type union for 'running' | 'completed' | 'failed' | 'interrupted'
tasks.report: Added SessionStatus type union, SessionRecord interface, and extended Task interface with sessions array and currentSessionId fields in src/lib/types.ts. All types are exported and backwards compatible (new fields are optional).

tasks.name: Export new types from tasks.ts module
tasks.report: Added SessionStatus type union, SessionRecord interface, and extended Task interface with sessions array and currentSessionId fields in src/lib/types.ts. All types are exported and backwards compatible (new fields are optional).

tasks.name: Update task validation functions to handle optional sessions array
tasks.report: Added validateTaskSessions() and validateSessionRecord() functions to handle optional sessions array validation in tasks.ts

tasks.name: Add migration helper to add empty sessions array to existing tasks
tasks.report: Added migrateTaskSessions() and migrateTasksFileSessions() to add empty sessions array to existing tasks

tasks.name: Update tasks.json read/write functions to preserve session data
tasks.report: Updated readTasksFile() to auto-migrate and addTasks() to preserve sessions/currentSessionId

tasks.name: Add validation for SessionRecord structure integrity
tasks.report: Added validateSessionRecord() with full field validation for SessionRecord structure

tasks.name: Generate unique session ID before spawning opencode process
tasks.report: Implemented session tracking in execute.ts: added generateSessionId(), startTaskSession(), completeTaskSession(), getCurrentTaskSession(), and getTaskSessions() to tasks.ts. Updated execute.ts to track sessions for all tasks in a thread before spawning opencode and update status on completion. Added comprehensive test suite with 11 passing tests.

tasks.name: Create SessionRecord with 'running' status and persist to tasks.json
tasks.report: Implemented session tracking in execute.ts: added generateSessionId(), startTaskSession(), completeTaskSession(), getCurrentTaskSession(), and getTaskSessions() to tasks.ts. Updated execute.ts to track sessions for all tasks in a thread before spawning opencode and update status on completion. Added comprehensive test suite with 11 passing tests.

tasks.name: Update SessionRecord on process completion with exit code and status
tasks.report: Implemented session tracking in execute.ts: added generateSessionId(), startTaskSession(), completeTaskSession(), getCurrentTaskSession(), and getTaskSessions() to tasks.ts. Updated execute.ts to track sessions for all tasks in a thread before spawning opencode and update status on completion. Added comprehensive test suite with 11 passing tests.

tasks.name: Handle both TUI and piped execution modes for session tracking
tasks.report: Implemented session tracking in execute.ts: added generateSessionId(), startTaskSession(), completeTaskSession(), getCurrentTaskSession(), and getTaskSessions() to tasks.ts. Updated execute.ts to track sessions for all tasks in a thread before spawning opencode and update status on completion. Added comprehensive test suite with 11 passing tests.

tasks.name: Clear currentSessionId and move session to history array on completion
tasks.report: Implemented session tracking in execute.ts: added generateSessionId(), startTaskSession(), completeTaskSession(), getCurrentTaskSession(), and getTaskSessions() to tasks.ts. Updated execute.ts to track sessions for all tasks in a thread before spawning opencode and update status on completion. Added comprehensive test suite with 11 passing tests.

tasks.name: Generate session IDs for each thread before parallel spawn
tasks.report: Added generateSessionId import usage. Session IDs are generated before spawn using the existing generateSessionId() function from tasks.ts.

tasks.name: Implement atomic tasks.json updates to handle concurrent writes
tasks.report: Added proper-lockfile import to tasks.ts. Implemented withTasksLock(), startTaskSessionLocked(), completeTaskSessionLocked(), startMultipleSessionsLocked(), and completeMultipleSessionsLocked() functions for atomic concurrent writes.

tasks.name: Track session status per tmux window using window hooks or polling
tasks.report: Added pane status tracking functions to tmux.ts: PaneStatus interface, getSessionPaneStatuses(), getPaneStatus(), isPaneAlive(), getPaneExitCode(), getExitedPanes(), getAlivePanes(), waitForAllPanesExit(), and setPaneTitle(). Added tests for these functions.

tasks.name: Update all session statuses on batch completion
tasks.report: Added session status update on batch completion in multi.ts. When user detaches from tmux, all pane statuses are checked and sessions are updated atomically using completeMultipleSessionsLocked(). Status is determined by pane exit codes.

tasks.name: Integrate with tmux.ts to capture window exit events
tasks.report: Integrated session tracking with tmux.ts by importing getSessionPaneStatuses() and using it in the close handler to check pane exit statuses. The threadSessionMap tracks the mapping between session IDs and pane IDs for status updates.

tasks.name: Rename fix.ts to add-stage.ts and update internal command name
tasks.report: Renamed fix.ts to add-stage.ts and updated all internal references from FixCliArgs to AddStageCliArgs, and command name from 'work fix' to 'work add-stage' in help text

tasks.name: Update command registration in CLI router/index
tasks.report: Added import for addStageMain and registered 'add-stage' command in SUBCOMMANDS object in bin/work.ts

tasks.name: Add deprecation wrapper that shows warning and forwards to add-stage
tasks.report: Converted fix.ts to a deprecation wrapper that shows a warning and forwards all calls to add-stage command

tasks.name: Update help text and command descriptions
tasks.report: Updated help text in bin/work.ts to show 'add-stage' as the primary command and marked 'fix' as deprecated

tasks.name: Update SKILL.md CLI reference documentation
tasks.report: Updated CLI reference in skills/planning-workstreams/SKILL.md to use 'add-stage' instead of 'fix'

tasks.name: Create new fix.ts with logic to find incomplete/failed threads
tasks.report: Implemented fix command core logic with: (1) findIncompleteThreads() to list threads with incomplete/failed status, (2) executeResume() to resume sessions using stored session ID via opencode --session, (3) executeRetry() to retry threads with same or different agent, (4) --new-stage flag as alias to add-stage command. All execution functions track sessions via startTaskSession/completeTaskSession APIs.

tasks.name: Implement --resume flag to resume specific thread session
tasks.report: Implemented fix command core logic with: (1) findIncompleteThreads() to list threads with incomplete/failed status, (2) executeResume() to resume sessions using stored session ID via opencode --session, (3) executeRetry() to retry threads with same or different agent, (4) --new-stage flag as alias to add-stage command. All execution functions track sessions via startTaskSession/completeTaskSession APIs.

tasks.name: Implement --retry flag to retry thread with same agent
tasks.report: Implemented fix command core logic with: (1) findIncompleteThreads() to list threads with incomplete/failed status, (2) executeResume() to resume sessions using stored session ID via opencode --session, (3) executeRetry() to retry threads with same or different agent, (4) --new-stage flag as alias to add-stage command. All execution functions track sessions via startTaskSession/completeTaskSession APIs.

tasks.name: Implement --agent flag to retry with different agent

All execution functions track sessions via startTaskSession/completeTaskSession APIs.

tasks.name: Add opencode session resume integration using stored session ID
tasks.report: Implemented fix command core logic with: (1) findIncompleteThreads() to list threads with incomplete/failed status, (2) executeResume() to resume sessions using stored session ID via opencode --session, (3) executeRetry() to retry threads with same or different agent, (4) --new-stage flag as alias to add-stage command. All execution functions track sessions via startTaskSession/completeTaskSession APIs.

tasks.name: Create thread status table display showing status, sessions count, and last agent
tasks.report: Created interactive UI functions for thread status table display in lib/interactive.ts

tasks.name: Implement thread selection prompt when no --thread flag provided
tasks.report: Implemented thread selection prompt in cli/fix.ts using selectThreadFromStatuses function

tasks.name: Implement action selection prompt: Resume, Retry, Change Agent, New Stage
tasks.report: Implemented action selection prompt with selectFixAction supporting Resume, Retry, Change Agent, New Stage

tasks.name: Add agent selection prompt showing available agents from agents.yaml
tasks.report: Implemented agent selection prompt using loadAgentsConfig and selectAgent function showing agents from agents.yaml

tasks.name: Add confirmation prompt before executing selected action
tasks.report: Added confirmation prompt using confirmAction function before executing selected action

tasks.name: Add check for incomplete/failed threads with session history
tasks.report: Added check for incomplete/failed threads with session history in next batch using findIncompleteThreadsInBatch function in src/cli/continue.ts

tasks.name: Display summary of found issues before continuing
tasks.report: Display thread status table with summary before offering options in src/cli/continue.ts using buildThreadStatuses and displayThreadStatusTable

tasks.name: Add interactive prompt: Continue (skip failed), Fix first, Abort
tasks.report: Added interactive prompt with 3 options: Continue (skip failed), Fix first, Abort using readline interface in src/cli/continue.ts

tasks.name: Delegate to work fix when user selects "Fix first" option
tasks.report: Delegate to work fix command when user selects option 2 (Fix first) by calling fixMain with original argv in src/cli/continue.ts

tasks.name: Add session count and last session status to thread display
tasks.report: Added session count, last session status, running session indicator, and resumable thread indicator to stage display in formatProgress. Session info shows as [Ns N▶ N⟲] where N is count of sessions/running/resumable.

tasks.name: Add indicator for currently running sessions
tasks.report: Implemented running session indicator (▶) in stage summary. Running sessions are counted and displayed in the session info bracket.

tasks.name: Add indicator for resumable threads
tasks.report: Implemented resumable thread indicator (⟲). Threads are marked as resumable if their last session was interrupted or failed and tasks are not completed.

tasks.name: Implement --sessions flag for detailed session history view
tasks.report: Implemented --sessions flag that displays detailed session history per thread including status icons (✓✗▶⏸), agent name, model, duration, exit code, and timestamps. Added formatSessionHistory function to lib/status.ts.

tasks.name: Update planning-workstreams SKILL.md with new fix workflow
tasks.report: Updated documentation for session tracking and fix workflows across SKILL.md files and README.
